column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba twice and generally find it a safe and pleasant option
column2: especially when in a pinch. The food is pretty good (nothing I've ever had is worse than "average")
column4: ensuring a minimal wait time even on a Friday
column5: and the menu is vast enough to accommodate a wide array of tastes. Even their drinks are not overly sweet or watered down- solid all around!
